sentences.en: A few sentences regarding preignition and detonation may be helpful.
sentences.cn: 再说几句有关早燃和爆燃的问题,或许是有益处的.

sentences.en: Deflagration of combustible cloud formed by hydrocarbon fuels dispersed in air can easily transfered to detonation.
sentences.cn: 碳氢燃料在空气中形成的可燃气云,点火后容易从燃烧发展为爆轰.

sentences.en: Detonation limits and critical initiation energy of hydrocarbon - air mixtures were measured in the shock tube.
sentences.cn: 借助于激波管测定了几种碳氢燃料和空气混合物的爆轰极限、临界起爆能.

sentences.en: Given sufficient turbulence in the combustion chamber, detonation is unlikely to occur.
sentences.cn: 假定在燃烧室中形成充分的湍流, 就不可能产生爆燃.

sentences.en: Globular nanometer � � aluminum oxide powder was synthesized through detonation of aluminum nitrate.
sentences.cn: 摘要用爆轰法合成了纳米γ氧化铝粉体.

sentences.en: It has the advantage of small volume while big capacity and good anti - detonation tone quality.
sentences.cn: 其体积小、容量大、 抗震 音质好,具有明显的市场优势.

sentences.en: On the basis of experiments, the relations of the condition of cloud detonation are summarized.
sentences.cn: 本文讨论了与燃料抛撒和雾化有关的问题, 并在实验基础上归纳得到云爆条件的基本关系式.

sentences.en: Periodicity advance model of 1 - D slab symmetry detonation wave is investigated.
sentences.cn: 一 维 平面对称爆轰波的推进具有周期性.

sentences.en: The chart entropytemperature in gas detonation is that of energy flow limitation of gas detonation.
sentences.cn: 瓦斯传爆温熵图,是瓦斯传爆的能流界限图.

sentences.en: The computed evolution of detonation wave involving the re - initiation is in good agreement with schlieren images.
sentences.cn: 计算得到的二次起爆过程波系演变与实验纹影照片基本一致.

sentences.en: The nitroalkanol imparts improved sensitivity and detonation velocities.
sentences.cn: 硝化烷醇提高了感度和爆速.

sentences.en: The performance characteristics, structure and working cycle of pulse detonation rocket engine ( PDRE ) were introduced firstly.
sentences.cn: 摘要阐述了脉冲爆震火箭发动机 ( PDRE ) 性能特点 、 结构和工作过程.

sentences.en: The re - initiation phenomenon of gaseous detonation induced by shock reflection in a bifurcated tube was studied.
sentences.cn: 以分叉管为例,研究了激波反射诱导气相爆轰二次起爆的现象.

sentences.en: The study ways, characterization parameters and influence factors of deflagration to detonation transition are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了燃烧转爆轰的研究方法 、 表征参数和影响因素.

sentences.en: This device can be used to fill mixture gases in some combustion and detonation experiments.
sentences.cn: 适用于各种燃烧、爆轰实验的气体混合.

trans.tran_en: A detonation is a large or powerful explosion
